sourcesContent:
{{ product.name }}

Описание: {{ product.description }}

Цена: {{ product.price | currency: 'KZT' }}

Рейтинг: {{ product.rating }}

import {Component, Input} from '@angular/core'; import {Product} from "../products"; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-item', templateUrl: './product-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-item.component.css'] }) export class ProductItemComponent { @Input() product: Product | undefined; }
